name: Steady Parent Community
what_it_is: A private group of parents going through the same things you are — active, supportive, and ready to discuss how it really works.
founder_presence: Founders are active and present daily.

cta_copy.title: Other parents have stood where you are standing
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share what actually works when kids get physical. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Other parents understand the anxiety spiral too
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share what is helping their anxious kids feel braver. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: When the meltdown passes and you need to talk
cta_copy.body: A private group for the hard emotional moments no one else seems to understand. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Body safety conversations are hard to navigate alone
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents ask the awkward questions about consent and safety talks. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Breaking patterns is lonely without people who understand
cta_copy.body: A private group of parents rewriting their family story one hard day at a time. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Holding boundaries without yelling is a team effort
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share what works when limits get tested every single day. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Other parents survived the food fights too
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share mealtime wins and disasters with zero judgment. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: You do not have to figure this out alone
cta_copy.body: A private group of parents who remember the newborn fog and will tell you the truth. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Your family does not fit in a parenting box
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents build approaches that fit their real lives, not a textbook. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Parents who actually read the research before deciding
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents dig into what the science says, not just trending advice. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Potty training is easier with someone who gets it
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share the messy truth about potty training on every timeline. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Screen time does not have to be a daily fight
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share screen boundaries that actually hold without constant battles. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Other parents are done playing sibling referee too
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share what actually reduces the fighting between their kids. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Sleep help without the judgment or method wars
cta_copy.body: A private group where exhausted parents share what actually worked at bedtime. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Helping your child find their people starts here
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share social wins and setbacks with real honesty. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Parents who get the intensity and would not trade it
cta_copy.body: A private group where spirited-kid parents share strategies and hard-won solidarity. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Staying calm is a practice not a personality trait
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents work on their own regulation and share the hard moments. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: The tantrum just happened and you need to talk
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents debrief the hard moments and share what actually helped. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Raising a teen without losing the relationship
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents of teens share what keeps connection alive through adolescence. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Other families have navigated this change before you
cta_copy.body: A private group where parents share transition strategies that actually helped their kids adjust. We are there with you daily too.

name: Beyond Hitting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression at every age.

cta_copy.title: Start the Beyond Hitting course
cta_copy.body: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression — so you know exactly what to do next time.

name: The Hitting Response Flowchart
what_it_is: A printable decision tree for what to say and do when your child gets physical.

cta_copy.title: Get The Hitting Response Flowchart
cta_copy.body: A printable decision tree that tells you exactly what to say and do when your child gets physical — so you stop freezing in the moment.

name: Childhood Anxiety
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping your child manage worry, fear, and avoidance behaviors.

cta_copy.body: A printable worry journal page and worry time rules card so your child can process anxious thoughts without them taking over the whole day.
